about_the_game:
■STORY
A mysterious tower suddenly appeared near the town of Stadt.
As the (self-claimed) Number One adventurer of the guild, Chris the Swordmaiden is eager to take up a challenge,
meanwhile Anita the shy loner Mage somehow got herself dragged into Chris's quest.

Can the duo conquer The Cursed Tower of Lust!?
※Both characters can be freely swapped from beginning, however they will not act together as a party.


■SYSTEM

Game progress by card selection.
Each card has their own event, such as Battle, Item, Trap, Abnormal Status, and more!
Pick cards wisely according to your situation!


■BATTLE H! RESTRAINT! HUMILIATION! MOANS!

In battle, monsters will attempt to break your armor/clothes and restrain you.
Continuously taking restraining attacks and you will be unable to fight back, and get humiliated...
There will be character voice for humiliation scenes!


■PLENTY OF BAD STATUSES!!

Ranging from the basic 【Armor Break】 and 【Naked】,
to more challenging 【Masochism】, 【Jinx】, 【Womb Crest】 etc.
Many also affect your appearance such as 【Blindfold】, 【Gag】, 【Bukkake】, 【Lactation】, 【Swollen Clit】, 【Futanari】 etc etc...
There are just tons and TONS of bad statuses to look for!
※There will be accessory to negate certain statuses, in case they make you feel uncomfortable.


■H TRAPS!!

Within the Cursed Tower lies not only monsters but also traps!!
Swallowed whole by a tentacle pot falling from the ceiling, restrained by countless mechanical arms, immobilized on all fours...
And getting caught is never the end of it, for those tentacles and machines will take their chances on a disabled prey!!


■AND MANY OTHER H EVENTS!

Letting a Merchant have his way with your body for a discount,
watching reminiscences of other fallen adventurers,
and many more!!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Sexual scenes, Prostitute, Torture, Brainwash.

It also contain non-consensual sex.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3210M CPU 2.5GHz 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.21 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Self-claimed Number One adventurer Chris the Swordmaiden is eager to challenge a new mysterious dungeon, dragging Anita the loner Mage along with her. Can the duo conquer The Cursed Tower of Lust!?
